EmailTemplate.name: 2012_CustomerGolfTournament.SaveTheDate
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the Date! TriTech Customer Golf Tournament
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Save the Date! TriTechs' Customer Golf Tournament
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Be sure to mark your calendars and plan to attend this fun-filled event which includes golf, dinner, contests and prizes. As in the past, we will be donating any proceeds to COPS and the Leary Foundation. In addition to the fun, you'll be helping two great causes. http://www.learyfirefighters.org/ http://www.nationalcops.org/
Tuesday, October 9, 2012 11:00 AM Registration | 12:00 PM - Shotgun | Dinner - 5:00 PM Highfields Golf & Country Club 42 Magill Drive (off Route 122) Grafton, Massachusetts
More information to come! Contact: David Bell <David.Bell@TriTech.com> | 774-239-3722
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road - San Diego, CA 92121
